long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Echelon from November Games empowers game developers and aspiring streamers alike.

The system takes control of a Twitch tab, automatically navigating to a stream of a player of a participating Echelon game.  The result? The best players get a viewership boost on Twitch, giving them increased discoverability, and a new path to pro, just by being good a video game.

Meanwhile, having the extension installed and loaded earns you bonuses, items, unlocks, and resources in-game, all in real-time.  It's the first system to take advantage of the power of the player-base, rewarding the best gamers and community members with a shot at partner on Twitch.

Echelon is 100% Twitch Approved.
